Renting a computer from AmazonÂ¶

So, as we’ve discussed, we’re going to be renting computers from Amazon for the remainder of the course.

Upsides:

  1. The Amazon computer will pretty much always work.
  2. You’ll be in an environment that you completely control.

Downsides:

  1. Overhead. ($$ – ask your advisor)
  2. You have to take control of the environment.

To get started, see starting-your-cloud-system.

Be sure to go to installing-your-cloud-system.
